title: Looking for 2 to join a group of 3 - Silver ELO
body:
Hey Guys,

We have 3.

1x Mid
1x Jng / Support
1x Top / fill

We are looking for 2 to join. Would be good to find a bot duo but we are happy to move around and create the best team based on skill set etc. 

Get in contact if you want to join or chat.

replies.body: yo im keen to join i main Top/Supp and i can bring an ADC we have good synergy.
Accounts: I have 10 accounts 11 of them are banned yes I said 11 cause my next one will probably get banned because my botlane always sucks and they can't play it's always the botlane that tilts me.

Team player: Yes I would say I'm a team Player cause if I die it's my teams fault if I lose it's my teams fault it's never my fault usually the jgs fault.. Do we even have a jg?  Anywho you could say I'm a constructive team Player.

My playstyle: I usually gift first blood to my enemy laner to give them a false sense of hope and I will continue gifting kills until I'm about 10 deaths in and that's when I hit my powerspike I will split push either top or bot or both and the enemy team will just leave me alone cause they feel sorry for me but that's my whole plan and then I get that 50g from nexus ggwp
About myself I work as a janitor at a high school sometimes I'll see an equation like half an equation on the board and I'll just solve it

Hey mate my names Syruz but friends call me Syruz but you can call me Syruz I'll be happy to join your squad mate I'm a good mate just waiting for a mate mate OK I mid main mate bye mate see you on the rift
